item.title: Alternative blog at http://blog.parallelo.ai
item.description: I’m not of an active blogger in this site, but you can take a look at http://blog.parallelo.ai and get in touch with some of my work-related blog posts.

item.title: Old Blog
item.description: Daniel’s log book The site https://dalogbook.blogspot.com/ is my old blog, which I haven’t updated since forever. Nevertheless I have lots of drafts soon to be published so stay tuned for updates.
